name: Blade&Soul: Revolution
description:
▣ Game Introduction ▣
Experience the epic martial arts game on mobile.
Blade&Soul: Revolution Now Available!

■▶ Windwalk across sky, land, and water!
Soar through the beautiful skies and massive full-3D landscapes of Blade&Soul : Revolution!

■▶ A Tale of Revenge
Experience a sweeping epic tale of revenge through high-quality cinematics

Your path to vengeance against your master's murderer, Jinsoyun, begins today!

■▶ Unique & intricate skill combinations based on the Class of your choice

Master and hone each character's skill set and create custom combos attacks.
Combine attacks with fellow players in real-time and lay waste to your opponents!

You won't be able to take your eyes off the action-packed battles.

■▶ Join Faction War.

A strategic battle between Cerulean and Crimson
War on a massive scale played out in real-time in an open field.

Join the Faction War with up to 500 players on each server!

■▶ Join a thriving community.

Create your story by working together, and sometimes even fighting against one another.
Join a clan and assist your faction!

The community awaits you!

For the fastest news updates on Blade&Soul: Revolution...
◈ Visit the Official Community: https://forum.netmarble.com/bns_revolution
◈ Visit the Official Website: https://bnsrev.netmarble.com/
◈ Visit the Official Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/BNSROfficial
